text:
Druie Douglas Barnard Jr. (March 20, 1922 – January 11, 2018) was an American politician. He served as a member of the United States House of Representatives from Georgia's 10th congressional district from 1977 through 1993. He was born in Augusta, Georgia. He was a member of the Democratic Party.
Barnard, Jr. died on January 11, 2018 in Augusta, Georgia of pneumonia at the age of 95.
